translations.name: The Expanded Bible
translations.description: The Expanded Bible incorporates, within each line, the information one would find in a variety of Bible reference works, making it possible to read and study the Bible at the same time. The base text is a modified version of the New Century Version, a clear and accurate, meaning-based (functional-equivalent) Bible version.
